> Healing is one of the best moves in the game

You can't possible overstate the importance of having a cleric on your 
team.  (Never hire a single cleric, though, You always need two so 
that one cleric can heal another).  One a time I went through a level 
without a cleric and couldn't win without massive casualties.  I hired 
a cleric and casualities disappeared.

Heck, you could place 2 clerics side by side in a battle and they 
could keep healing themselves without causing any damage while racking 
up lots of experience points.
